cut the potbelly into slices and then

originally the dish is made with laho
but it's not easy to find these days so
you can also use spinach or penguin

then chop them up then blend well with
drill ml water extract the green juice
by letting the mixture run through a
sieve
next we're gonna heat up the green juice
until it reaches around 40 to 50 degrees
Celsius or you can also microwave it for
about a minute in a large mixing bowl
combine 270 gram of glutinous rice flour
with 30 gram of rice flour then make a
hole in the center and slowly pouring
the warm green juice mix well until the

with your hands until it's come together
into a dough don't forget to add a

some more green food color or pay me

grease your hand with some vegetable a

bring well and then toss with about a

cover the lid of the steamer with a
